tabs.headline: Cross-Org Commerce
tabs.body: Invoice â†’ Adoption â†’ Payment â†’ Settlement. Vendor's AI drafts invoice, Client's AI validates against budget, auto-reconciles both ledgers.

tabs.headline: Product Lifecycle
tabs.body: Product â†’ Store â†’ Proposal â†’ PO. AI generates descriptions, buyer's AI compares specs, seller's AI drafts proposals, procurement AI validates.

attributes.headline: Software that behaves like media.
attributes.subheadline: Every Card is a file AI can attach, inspect, and transform, just like you attach a JPG to an email. Cards carry their own meaning wherever they go.
